Key Match Events: Bryce Harper sparked Philadelphia’s comeback from a two-run deficit by reaching 20 homers for the ninth time.
Harper homered to right center (451 feet).
Alec Bohm homered to left center (360 feet).
Bryce Harper singled to right, scoring two runs.
Brandon Nimmo tripled to center, scoring two runs.
Francisco Lindor hit a sacrifice fly to left, scoring a run.
J.T. Realmuto singled to center, scoring a run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Citizens Bank Park with an attendance of 40,388.
The game lasted 2 hours and 31 minutes.
